artifact-dropped-md5.description: The MD5 of an additional file that was either extracted from or downloaded by the attachment.

artifact-dropped-name.description: Name of an additional file that was either extracted from or downloaded by the attachment.

artifact-dropped-sha1.description: The SHA1 of an additional file that was either extracted from or downloaded by the attachment.

artifact-dropped-sha256.description: The SHA256 of an additional file that was either extracted from or downloaded by the attachment.

attachment-md5.description: The MD5 of the file that was attached to the e-mail itself.

attachment-name.description: The name of the file that was attached to the e-mail itself.

attachment-sha1.description: The SHA1 of the file that was attached to the e-mail itself.

attachment-sha256.description: The SHA256 of the file that was attached to the e-mail itself.

c2-domain.description: Command and control domain detected during analysis.

c2-ip.description: Command and control IP address detected during analysis.

c2-url.description: Command and control URL detected during analysis.

date.description: Date and time the e-mail was sent.

email-sender.description: The source address from which the e-mail was sent.

malicious-url.description: Malicious URL that downloaded additional malware.

research-links.description: A link to an external analysis (VirusTotal, urlscan, etc.).

sender-ip.description: The source IP from which the e-mail was sent.

subject.description: The subject line of the e-mail.
